metadata.name: Remote Access Tool - ScreenConnect Remote Command Execution
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of a system command via the ScreenConnect RMM service.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.parent_process.name), lower('\\\\screenconnect.clientservice.exe')) AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\cmd.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('cmd.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\\\temp\\\\screenconnect\\\\')))

output.summary: Detects the execution of a system command via the ScreenConnect RMM service.

metadata.objective: False positive: Legitimate use of ScreenConnect. Disable this rule if ScreenConnect is heavily used. Reference: https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma/pull/4467
